item.title: CVE-2023-6751|2024-08-02T08:42:07.326Z -- hostinger -- hostinger
item.description: The Hostinger plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized plugin settings update due to a missing capability check on the function publish_website in all versions up to, and including, 1.9.7. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to enable and disable maintenance mode.
